_sText:
I really wanted to do a map with custom decals and textures. Here it is! 
This was my first map. It is located in a dark, dank cavern where no-one is safe. There are a couple of secrets, though minor, and a little.... "puzzle" to get to the AUG and Kreig 552. 
Please review this, and add to your map rotation. There is only one minor flaw - I used a custom ragdoll from ZM. To people who have not downloaded the lextlionis(?) ZM file, it will show up checkered. My apologies. Alas, this is only a minor thing.
VT... happened as I was making this map. In honor of  VT victims, families, and survivors, I dedicate this to you.
Thank you.
~Hobbes312
